shs-docs

A documentation generator package designed for SHSDX OpMod developers.

Dependencies

Name Ver Description
del ^3.0.0 Delete files and folders using globs.
docdash 0.4.1 Lodash inspired JSDoc 3 template/theme.
gulp ^3.9.1 Toolkit for automating painful or time-consuming tasks.
gulp-rename ^1.2.3 Gulp plugin to rename files easily.
gulp-run-command 0.0.9 A simple way to run command-line programs from gulp in a cross-platform way.
gulp-sequence ^1.0.0 Run a series of gulp tasks in order.
gulp-svn2 ^2.0.0 SVN plugin for Gulp.
gulp-template ^5.0.0 Render/precompile Lodash/Underscore templates.
gulp-todo ^6.0.0 Parse and output TODOs and FIXMEs from comments in your file in a stream.
jsdoc ^3.5.5 An API documentation generator for JavaScript.
jsdoc-vue-component ^2.2.4 A simple plugin for JSDoc to parse .vue Single-File Components.
lodash ^3.5.5 A modern JavaScript utility library delivering modularity, performance, & extras.
prism 1.14.0 Lightweight, robust, elegant syntax highlighting.
prism-treeview - Treeview language definition for Prism.
uikit ^3.0.0-rc.5 A lightweight and modular front-end framework for developing fast and powerful web interfaces.
webpack 4.11.1 A bundler for javascript and friends.
webpack-cli ^3.0.2 CLI for Webpack.

Documentation generated by JSDoc.
